channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How one Canadian's misplaced signature caused a diplomatic incident at the end of WWII

item.description: Life was turbulent for Patrick Furlong after his parents divorced when he was in 8th grade. His father left, so he needed to navigate daily routines w...

item.title: Starter homes are scarce, so Utah set a target to build more. Here's how it's going

item.title: Gold price hits record high as investors seek safety
item.description: Experts say uncertainty resulting from US policy is making investors seek safer investments such as gold.

item.title: Beijing tightens control ahead of Xi's big moment on world stage
item.description: It is a big week for Xi Jinping, who will host Vladimir Putin and Kim Jong Un in Beijing at a massive military parade.

item.title: Russia's Putin hails 'unprecedented' ties with China at talks in Beijing
item.description: The two leaders are seeking to promote "a more just and reasonable global governance system".

item.title: Hundreds killed in Sudan landslide, UN says
item.description: Sunday's landslide followed heavy rain and "levelled" a remote village, a local armed group says.

item.title: Aerial search for survivors after Afghan quake kills 800 people
item.description: Rescuers are hampered by mountainous terrain and roads strewn with debris.

item.title: Final preparations for trial of man accused of attempting to assassinate Trump in Florida
North Carolina pummeled by TCU in Bill Belichick's college coaching debut
item.description: North Carolina was pummeled by TCU, 48-14, in the college coaching debut of NFL coaching legend Bill Belichick.

item.title: Landslide levels village in Sudan's Darfur region, kills roughly 1,000
item.description: A landslide wiped out a village in Sudan 's Darfur region, killing an estimated 1,000 people, a rebel group controlling the area said.

item.title: Congress returns to face chaotic funding fight, Epstein drama, crime crackdown
item.description: Congress returns this week from its August recess staring down a deadline to fund the government and avert a possible shutdown by month's end.

item.title: Trump says he’s awarding former New York Mayor Rudy Giuliani the Presidential Medal of Freedom
What to know about Guatemalan migrant children and efforts to send them home
item.description: The Trump administration has tried to deport Guatemalan children living in U.S. shelters or foster care.
